description: Manages L3 attributes for IPv4 and IPv6 interfaces on HUAWEI CloudEngine switches.

mask.description: Subnet mask for IPv4 or IPv6 Address in decimal format.

ipv4_type.description: Specifies an address type. The value is an enumerated type. main, primary IP address. sub, secondary IP address.

state.description: Specify desired state of the resource.

interface.description: Full name of interface, i.e. 40GE1/0/22, vlanif10.
